definitions.title: n. pr. 1. loc.
definitions.body: in Judah Jos 15:55 (P), 1Sa 25:2 (LXX Maan, Mawn), now Ma‘în (Buhl:Geogr. 163 and reff.), 8 miles S. of Hebron; hence ´[[מִדְבַּר מ]] 1Sa 23:24, 1Sa 23:25, 1Sa 23:25, so rd. also 1Sa 25:1 (for MT [[פארן]]) LXX Th We Dr Bu Klo Kit Löhr; cf.

definitions.title: 3. gent.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 10:12 named with Sidonians and Amalek as ancient foes of Isr.; poss. intended by writer as = [[מְעוּנִים]] q. v. p. 589 supr.; many read [[מִדְיׇן]] (LXX:BA LXXL Madiam); v. GFM.—[[מְעוֹן]] v. [[בֵּית בַּעַל]] [[מְעוֹן]] p. III supr.; 1Ch 4:41 v. [[מְעוּנִים]] p. 589.
